thread.title: CORRECTED-(OFFICIAL)-BRIEF-Paris - Pemex CEO says target is 1.95 mln bpd production in 2018

title: CORRECTED-(OFFICIAL)-BRIEF-Paris - Pemex CEO says target is 1.95 mln bpd production in 2018
text:
(Corrects headline and text after Pemex issues clarification to say CEO was referring to 2018, not 2019, with 1.95 mln bpd target)
April 19 (Reuters) - Petroleos Mexicanos:
* MEXICOâ€™S PEMEX CEO TREVINO TOLD OIL SUMMIT IN PARIS THAT COMPANY TARGETS TO REACH 1.95 MILLION BARRELS-PER-DAY (BPD) OIL PRODUCTION IN 2018.
* TREVINO SAID PRODUCTION WAS INFLECTING AND WILL REACH THE TARGET.
* TREVINO SAYS PRODUCTION CURRENTLY AT 1.9 MILLION BPD AND WILL HIT 1.97 MILLION BPD AT THE END OF THE YEAR Further company coverage: (Reporting by Bate Felix)
